data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of Fissocantharis Pic (Coleoptera, Cantharidae) from Guangxi, China, with descriptions of six new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Yuxia, Li, Limei, Guan, Kaile, Yang, Xingke (2015): Taxonomy of Fissocantharis Pic (Coleoptera, Cantharidae) from Guangxi, China, with descriptions of six new species. ZooKeys 489: 95-123, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.489.9153, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.489.9153
